Permission_CreatePartnerPermissionGroupW.description: Request object for creating a new partner permission group.
Response object containing the UUID of the created partner permission group.

Permission_CreatePermissionGroupWSReques.description: Request object for creating a new permission group.

Permission_CreatePermissionGroupWSRespon.description: Response object containing the UUID of the created permission group.

Permission_DeletePartnerPermissionGroupW.description: Request object for deleting a partner permission group.
Response object for deleting a partner permission group.

Permission_DeletePermissionGroupWSReques.description: Request object for deleting a permission group.

Permission_DeletePermissionGroupWSRespon.description: Response object for deleting a permission group.

Permission_GetPartnerPermissionGroupWSRe.description: Response object containing partner permission groups and client permission group mappings.

clientPermissionGroupMap.description: Map of client UUIDs to their permission group types

additionalProperties.description: Map of permission group UUIDs to list of user UUIDs in each group

groupMembership.description: Map of permission group UUIDs to list of user UUIDs in each group

Permission_GetPartnerPermissionGroupsWSR.description: Request object for getting partner permission groups for the organization.

Permission_GetPermissionGroupsWSRequest.description: Request object for getting all permission groups in the organization.

Permission_GetPermissionGroupsWSResponse.description: Response object containing permission groups and membership information for the organization.

additionalProperties.description: Map of permission group UUIDs to list of user UUIDs in each group

groupMembership.description: Map of permission group UUIDs to list of user UUIDs in each group

additionalProperties.description: Map of partner UUIDs to list of user UUIDs in each partner organization

partnerMembership.description: Map of partner UUIDs to list of user UUIDs in each partner organization

permissionGroups.description: List of permission groups in the organization

Permission_GetPermissionsForCurrentPartn.description: Request object for getting permissions for the current partner user.
Response object containing partner permission information including functionality lists, client permissions, and group details.

assignablePermissionGroups.description: Set of partner permission group UUIDs the user can assign to other users

clientFunctionalityList.description: List of client functionalities the user has access to

clientPermissionMap.description: Map of client UUIDs to partner permission levels

functionalityList.description: List of partner functionalities the user has access to

permissionGroupName.description: Name of the partner user's permission group

superAdmin.description: Whether the partner user has super admin privileges

Permission_GetPermissionsForCurrentUserW.description: Request object for getting permissions for the current user.
Response object containing comprehensive permission information for the current user including functionality, device, location, and granular access maps.

accessControlLocationAccessMap.description: Map of access control location UUIDs to permission levels

accessMap.description: Deprecated: Map of device UUIDs to permission levels (use deviceAccessMap instead)

assignablePermissionGroups.description: Set of permission group UUIDs the user can assign to other users

deviceAccessMap.description: Map of device UUIDs to permission levels

functionalityList.description: List of functionalities the user has access to

installer.description: Whether the user has installer privileges

locationAccessMap.description: Map of location UUIDs to permission levels

additionalProperties.description: Map of location UUIDs to granular functionality permission maps

locationGranularAccessMap.description: Map of location UUIDs to granular functionality permission maps

permissionGroupName.description: Name of the user's permission group

superAdmin.description: Whether the user has super admin privileges

Permission_UpdatePartnerPermissionGroupW.description: Request object for updating an existing partner permission group.
Response object for updating a partner permission group.

Permission_UpdatePermissionGroupWSReques.description: Request object for updating an existing permission group.

Permission_UpdatePermissionGroupWSRespon.description: Response object for updating a permission group.
